contentencoded:
Is academic tracking good for our kids? New research shows gains in test scores when students are sorted by their academic ability.


Guest: Courtney Collins, Assistant Professor of Economics, Rhodes College.


Read Collins’s study, “Does Sorting Students Improve Scores? An Analysis of Class Composition.”
